snippet.title: Dark Passenger Gameplay
snippet.description:
You've relied on your eyes since birth, how will you survive without them?

* Navigate through a thrilling hostile confinement without the use of your sight!
* Discover the mysteries of a twisted and horrifying location.
* Stealth and agility will be your weapons of choice, use them wisely.

Can you rise up to the challenge? You've never had to be without your eyes before...

Vote for us out on Steam Greenlight so we can deliver this game to you!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles...

https://www.facebook.com/Dark-Passeng...

Full Game Credits:

Created by Daniel Pain

Voice Actors

Joshua Magill
Michael Booth
Daniel Pain

Music: http://www.purple-planet.com

Sound Assets - Each sound listed is under Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/...). Some sounds have been modified

Nino Scuderi (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jSyIG...) - Heavy Breathing Man Sound - Man Breath Sound Effect (Vers. 1)
InspectorJ (https://www.freesound.org/people/Insp...) - Ticking Clock, A.wav || (https://www.freesound.org/people/Insp...) - Stream, Water, C.wav || (https://www.freesound.org/people/Insp...) - Glass Smash, Bottle, E.wav || (https://freesound.org/people/Inspecto...) Stream, Water, C.wav
MAJ061785 (https://www.freesound.org/people/MAJ0...) - male pain grunt.aif || (https://www.freesound.org/people/MAJ0...) - running up stairs.aif || (https://www.freesound.org/people/MAJ0...) male scream.aif
BenbonCan (https://www.freesound.org/people/Benb...) - Failling Down Wodden Stairs.wav || (https://www.freesound.org/people/Benb...) - Bricks Falling.wav
Augdog (https://www.freesound.org/people/Augd...) - dude steps.wav
Crater RF (https://freesound.org/people/Crater%2...) - Menjant Plàtan.wav
enochrooted (https://www.freesound.org/people/enoc...) - Toni-PigSqueal.wav
Hybrid_V (https://www.freesound.org/people/Hybr...) - Creepy Dungeon Door Slam
GoodListener (https://www.freesound.org/people/Good...) - Horse Snort 2.wav
n_audioman (https://www.freesound.org/people/n_au...) - Horse_Neight01.wav
jameswrowles (https://www.freesound.org/people/jame...) - electrocution.wav
Headphaze (https://www.freesound.org/people/Head...) - Electric Crackle Ticking
jorickhoofd (https://www.freesound.org/people/jori...) - Metal hit with metal bar resonance
bone666138 (https://www.freesound.org/people/bone...) - Wind Chimes
inchadney (https://www.freesound.org/people/inch...) - light rain in forest.wav.WAV
urupin (https://www.freesound.org/people/urup...) - Beads was scattered.
marcel_farres (https://www.freesound.org/people/marc...) Moving chair
nemoDaedalus (https://www.freesound.org/people/nemo...) - upanddownstairs.wav
Halleck (https://www.freesound.org/people/Hall...) - neck_crack.wav
Daxter31 (https://www.freesound.org/people/Daxt...) - snoring
Slave2theLight (https://www.freesound.org/people/Slav...) - Big Zombie Hit 1
CGEffex (https://www.freesound.org/people/CGEf...) - Dungeon Gates.wav
freeicecream12@gmail.com (https://www.freesound.org/people/free...) - Motion Detected
AderuMoro (https://www.youtube.com/user/AderuMoro) - young lady (https://www.freesound.org/people/Ader...)
Dr. Macak (http://www.freesound.org/people/Dr.%2...) - WindChin-cut.wav
Intimidated (https://www.freesound.org/people/Inti...) - The Chav

The following sound effect Body-Fall-2 was provided By Cosmic Embers www.youtube.com/cosmicembers (https://www.freesound.org/people/Cosm...)

Retro Elevator http://freesound.org/people/qubodup/s... by Iwan ‘qubodup’ Gabovitch http://freesound.org/people/qubodup under CC-BY 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/b...

Many other sounds have been used which are in the public domain using the Creative Commons CC0 1.0 license.

Thanks to the following two great sites that made this project possible by providing open assets to the community: www.freesound.org and www.purple-planet.com

No people or animals were harmed in the making of this game
